name: Bobby B. THOMAS and Beulah Grace Thomas, his wife, Appellants, v. Donald R. GLISAN and Dorothy C. Glisan, his wife

judges: Before EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
JONES, C. J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this casé.
parties: Bobby B. THOMAS and Beulah Grace Thomas, his wife, Appellants, v. Donald R. GLISAN and Dorothy C. Glisan, his wife.

opinions.text:
OPINION OF THE COURT
PER CURIAM.
Decree affirmed. Costs on the appellants.
JONES, C. J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this casé.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Russell I. Jenkins, Uniontown, for appellants.
L. D. McDaniel, John H. McDaniel, Uniontown, for appellees.
casebody.head_matter:
344 A.2d 476
Bobby B. THOMAS and Beulah Grace Thomas, his wife, Appellants, v. Donald R. GLISAN and Dorothy C. Glisan, his wife.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Oct. 4, 1974.
Decided Oct. 3, 1975.
Russell I. Jenkins, Uniontown, for appellants.
L. D. McDaniel, John H. McDaniel, Uniontown, for appellees.
Before EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
